scripts.test: cd server && npm test &&  cd ../client && npm test
scripts.test:local: cd client && npm test &&  cd ../server && npm run test:local
scripts.docker-build-images: cd client && npm run docker-build && cd ../server && npm run docker-build
scripts.docker-push-images: docker push seantokuzo/gogo-client && docker push seantokuzo/gogo-server
